content: do you enjoy twin stitches designs patterns make sure to sign up for the newsletter not to miss out on any promotions or brand new patterns 1 do you want to come join a community of amazing knitters where we have monthly knit alongs free knitting patterns zooms and so much more join us now everyone is welcome no matter your skill level 2 1 https //twinstitchesdesigns myflodesk com/x130ufm3sd 2 https //twin-stitches mn co/ buy 3 get one free place 4 of my self-published patterns in your cart and the 4th least expensive will be free no code needed please note this can t be combined with another coupon code please use the following hashtags when posting your photos on ig and ravelry #togetherweknitsocks #twinstitchesdesigns *together we knit socks are a free pattern that i wanted to create for anyone who would love to knit up a pair of socks during these hard times this is to bring us all together and closer to our craft times can be difficult not only mentally but financially enjoy this free pattern i hope it brings you comfort and joy* **sizes** s m l to fit approx women s small/medium women s large feet or a foot circumference of 8 25 9 21 22 5 cm **needles** 2 25 mm / us 1 or size needed to obtain correct gauge **yarn options** 50-70g of fingering weight yarn sample was knit using fruitful fusion in the winter bouquet colorway *fruitful fusion shop * https //www etsy com/uk/shop/fruitfulfusiondyes section_id=26901761 **gauge unblocked in stockinette** 36 stitches x 40 row per 4 / 10 1 cm **notions** tapestry needle
